content: Act as an expert best-selling author and write an outline for this book: "Write a 10-chapter story-based book that follows the journey of a professional woman of color named Rachel Michelle. Rachel is single, has two kids she is supporting through high school, and is considering leaving her corporate job to become an entrepreneur. The book should detail the steps she takes to create a life plan and make the leap, and ultimately show her success as an entrepreneur with five employees. The book should be written in a motivational and engaging style, incorporating practical and mental wellness strategies to help Rachel achieve her goals. The ultimate goal is to position the author as an authority in the holistic wellness and life coaching space and attract potential clients interested in developing peak performance and creating the life they dream of."
